title: Ibibio Contemporary Bible™
title_vernacular: Ñwed Abasi Ke Ikọ Ibibio Ayo Mfịn
copyright: © 2020 by Biblica, Inc. Used with permission. All rights reserved worldwide.
description_vernacular: Biblica, The International Bible Society, ano ikọ Abasi esọk mme awo ato ke adikappa ikọ, adimịñ ye adideeme ñwed Abasi ke Afrika, Esia Pasifik, Europe, Datịn Amerika, Middle East ye North Amerika. Ato ke utom ammọ enamma ke afịd ederimbod, Biblica eyaak ikọ Abasi enọ mme awo, nọ ato do anam uwem ammọ akpughọ nọ ammọ enie eti ewana ye Yisọs Krais.

links.title: Ñwed Abasi Ke Ikọ Ibibio Ayo Mfịn

language.name: Ibibio
language.area: Akwa Ibom state, Itu, Uyo, Etinan, Ikot Abasi, Ikono, Ekpe-Atai, Uruan, Onna, Nsit-Ubium, and Mkpat Enin LGAs.
